Class GameController

    huub.lievestro

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameController

        public GameController​(int boardDim,
                      Player blackPlayer,
                      Player whitePlayer,
                      boolean GUI)
        Creates a new GameController, including the game.
        Parameters:
        boardDim - is dimension of the board
        blackPlayer - the first player, and will be playing with BLACK
        whitePlayer - the second player, and will be playing with WHITE
        GUI - start a GUI to view the associated game (note: only one GUI can be started per VM)

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Starts the Go game.
        Asks after each ended game if the user want to continue. Continues until the user does not want to play anymore. TODO implementation?

      • endGame

        public void endGame​(char reason,
                    char caller)
        Plays the Go game.
        TODO: take a second look First the (still empty) board is shown. Then the game is played until it is over. Players can make a move one after the other. After each move, the game state is updated

      • hasGameGUI

        public boolean hasGameGUI()
        Returns if this GameController has an associated gameGUI.
        Returns:
        true if it has a GUI, false if not
